==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|あん|こく|めん|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|暗黒|tr1=ankoku|t1=darkness|面|tr2=men|t2=side, face|lang=ja}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|あんこくめん}}

# the dark, cruel side of a matter or situation
# (specifically relating to ''[[w:Star Wars|Star Wars]]'') the evil aspect of a mystical energy permeating the universe; the [[dark side]]

[[zh:暗黒面]]
